name: Markdown-it markdown parser
description: This script replaces the default markdown renderer with markdown-it and allows for optional LaTeX rendering support with the Markdown-It KaTeX plugin. (NOTE: LaTeX defaults to rendering with MathML ONLY). Dependencies markdown-it.js (v8.4.2 bundled with the script) Markdown-It KaTeX plugin (v0.18.0 bundled with the script) Usage For the possible configuration options check here. Important This script currently only works with legacy media links. You can turn them on in the General Settings. Important note: You need to use legacy image linking with this script, otherwise there will be no images shown in the preview!
